
SharpSquare Release Notes
=========================


1.3, released 2011-07-25
(Thanks to Vlad Kozin)
------------------------
- Updated method SearchVenues

1.2, released 2011-06-21
(Thanks to Axel Denker)
------------------------
- Method GetVenue returns a not empty Mayor

1.1, released 2011-05-16
(Thanks to Raymond Ris)
------------------------
- Method GetAccessToken returns a string (not JSON)
- Methods GetVenue, GetVenueHereNow, GetVenueTips, GetVenuePhotos, 
GetVenueLinks, GetTip, GetSpecial, GetVenue Categories, SearchVenues, 
GetVenuesTending, SearchTips do not require authentication

1.0, released 2011-04-07
------------------------
- Beta version released


Igloo Snc
http://www.igloolab.com
